=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Japan 100gram 3Cup Size Must Up Breast & Butt Enlargment Cream Pueraria Mirifica (3 Tubes 100g)
Review Date: 2016/03/04
Store: Must Up
Product Description: ['Correct Massage Techniques: Step 1: Spread the cream to the breast all around. Step 2: The body slightly to bend down, both hands pat the breast base, and upwardly pushes 10 times of each. Step 3: Pushes from the armpit to the cleavage 10 times of each. Step 4: With the middle finger and the ring finger, pulls several times of the chest ligament, is helpful to strength the breast and enhancement. Tips : 1) During the first week of using, massage twice a day in the morning and at night. 2) It is more effective to use the cream after taking a bath. 3) When your bust becomes fuller, remember to wear bras that fit and massage your bust every day.']
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Weight': '100 Grams', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '6.7 x 4.2 x 1.7 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Date First Available': 'December 30, 2013', 'Manufacturer': 'Must Up'}
Review Text: I like it I used the whole cream, I did not really see a different in size of my boobs or my butt, but it did make for a good moisturizer, which always helps with stretch marks.
Review Title: meh not bad, not good
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This individual demonstrates a significant interest in hair care and enhancement products, particularly preferring human hair extensions and hair coloring kits. Their ratings indicate a tendency to favor products that meet expectations for color, thickness, and usability, as evidenced by consistently high scores for the hair extensions and tint kits. However, they exhibit some dissatisfaction with tangling issues in hair extensions and a lack of results from cosmetic creams aimed at body enhancement. 

Key themes emerge around functionality and aesthetic enhancement, as the user consistently seeks products that are effective for both everyday use and special occasions. Quality is paramount, yet they show a moderate price sensitivity, opting for products that offer reasonable performance relative to cost rather than luxury options. Their enjoyment of vibrant colors, as demonstrated in hair extensions and tint kits, highlights a desire for self-expression through appearance.

Overall, their core preferences suggest a commitment to personal grooming and a willingness to explore various cosmetic solutions, while maintaining a critical eye towards performance and value.
